Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are jetting off on a Royal Tour after getting married last month.

Kensington Palace revealed the trip will take place in the Autumn.

The palace’s official Twitter account wrote: “The Duke and Duchess of Sussex will undertake an official visit to Australia, Fiji, the Kingdom of Tonga, and New Zealand in the Autumn.

“The tour will fall on the occasion of @InvictusSydney 2018.”

However, some are concerned about instances of the Zika virus in counties they are planning to visit.
title: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry baby plans may be on hold after royal tour plans revealed

meta_data.description: MEGHAN MARKLE, 36, and Prince Harry, 33, have announced plans for a Royal Tour. They will travel to some counties where risk of the Zika virus is high. Does this mean baby plans are on hold?
